trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
entries: Gunvald can reroll a saving throw he fails. He must use the new roll.

trait.name: Menacing Blows (1/Turn)
entries: Gunvald deals an extra 6 ({@damage 1d12}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of Gunvald's next turn.

trait.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: As a bonus action, Gunvald can regain 15 hit points.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage when used with two hands, plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) slashing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage, plus 6 ({@damage 1d12}) piercing damage if Gunvald uses Menacing Blows.
